column3: of the gladstone park neighborhood. beloved wife of the late walter wojnarowski. cherished mother of barbara (zdzislaw) nagengast and the late joan (patrick) thornton. proud grandmother of bridget and rebecca thornton. loving sister of the late stephany (william) deller and the late adeline (leon) bozyk. dear sister in law of the late harriet (jim) kolar
column4: the late emily (joseph) gera and the late helen (stanley) pokrzywa. fond aunt of many nieces and nephews. visitation sunday from 3 pm until 8 pm at the m. j. suerth funeral home
column6: chicago. funeral monday 9:30 am prayers to st. tarcissus church. mass 10:00 am. interment st. adalbert cemetery. in lieu of flowers memorials to rainbow hospice
